article.description: Ervin Mitchell scored 27 points on 10-for-14 shooting and Grambling defeated Alabama A&M 78-57 to close the regular season with five wins in the last six games.
article.headline: Mitchell's 27 helps Grambling top Alabama A&M in SWAC finale
article.linkText: Mitchell's 27 helps Grambling top Alabama A&M in SWAC finale
article.story: GRAMBLING, La. -- Ervin Mitchell scored 27 points on 10-for-14 shooting and Grambling defeated Alabama A&M 78-57 to close the regular season with five wins in the last six games. Avery Ugba scored 16 points and grabbed 14 rebounds and Remond Brown scored 14 points with five assists for Grambling (15-16, 10-8 Southwest Athletic Conference). The Tigers are in the hunt for the No. 4 seed to the SWAC tournament, which begins Tuesday in Houston, along with Prairie View, Jackson State and Southern. The Tigers scored 21 points off 18 Alabama A&M turnovers and had nine steals. Brown with three, and four blocked shots, Ugba with two. De'Ederick Petty led the Bulldogs (2-27, 2-16) with 16 points and Sherif Mohamed added 10. FROM AAM: Grambling is battling for the No. 4 seed in the upcoming SWAC Tournament and can fall out of the chance to host a game with a loss to A&M.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
